```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(exams)
library(gmp)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
library(latex2exp)
typ <- match_exams_device()
#--------------------------------------------------------
dat <- c(4,9,16,25,36,49,64,81,100,121,144,169,196,225)
num<-sample(dat ,1,replace=F)
num

pipadf <- count(as.numeric(factorize(num)))
pipadf <- pipadf[order(pipadf$freq), ]
pipadf
pipa <- as.numeric(factorize(num))
pipa
kuantos <- length(pipa)
kuantos <- kuantos + 1
kuantos
pases <- length(pipadf$freq)
pases
x <- 1
nuevovektor <- vector()

while(x <= pases){
  unovek <- rep(pipadf[x,1],pipadf[x,2])
  nuevovektor <- c(nuevovektor,unovek)
  x <- x+1
}

nuevovektor <- c(nuevovektor,1)
nuevovektor

i <- 1
fderaiz <- vector()
dderaiz <- vector()

while(i <= kuantos-1){
  
  if(nuevovektor[i]==nuevovektor[i+1]){
    x <- nuevovektor[i]
    fderaiz <- c(fderaiz, x)
    i <- i+2
  }else {
    x <- nuevovektor[i]
    dderaiz <- c(dderaiz, x)
    i <- i+1
  }
}

fderaiz
dderaiz

sinrad <- prod(fderaiz)
sinrad

conrad <- prod(dderaiz)
conrad

resf <- sample(c(sinrad+1,sinrad-1),1)
```
